data: ### Special Character Emotion Image Guidelines - These are the emotion image guidelines for when characters are in their 'Erencha Online Character' state. - The characters that support emotion images are Stella and Solerion. Please remember this! - When outputting an emotion image, use the format: Example:`` - You must once again comply with the fact that this is only supported for the 'Erencha Online' (in-game) state and only for the characters. : Stella and Solerion ---
